name: Engram
description: It's a rhythm game that be designed to require player using theirs all ten fingers, similar to playing piano, but more simpler then it. The game is maybe not quite funny because it is an experimental game for hand-eye coordination training purpose, I really hope you can enjoy all of the music.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bits Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4.3+ graphics cards Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
